title: Athletic Background and Training Philosophy
content: Ryan Flaherty is the founder of Prolific Athletes LLC, a sports performance training company based in Carlsbad, California, that specializes in teaching athletes of all levels to be fast and injury free. As a kid growing up, he was not considered fast, but he learned that speed is a skill that can be learned. Along with speed training, their philosophy equally emphasizes injury prevention. Every athlete is given an in-depth biomechanic movement analysis, movement screen, and past injury review before designing their unique training program.

title: Types of Athletes Trained
content: Ryan Flaherty trains all types of athletes including professional athletes from the NFL, NBA, MLB, Olympic Track and Field athletes, NCAA All Americans, and high school athletes all the way down to middle school all-stars.

title: Training Programs
content: We have multiple programs that we offer for youth athletes that teach them how to sprint properly, change-of-direction speed, stimulus response training, flexibility, and core strength. Our High School programs offer the same as the youth training and here we introduce weight training. We also have a large NFL combine training program that prepares future NFL stars for the NFL combine and draft.

title: Super Starch
content: Most recently, however, I have become a huge fan of Super Starch. I was introduced to Generation UCAN by you, (Peter Attia). I had actually never heard of it prior to you giving me some to try on my own last year. At the time I was struggling in my own personal training after making the switch to a higher fat, low carb, no sugar lifestyle and it made a big difference for me personally.

title: Benefits of Super Starch
content: I have always struggled figuring out when and what to eat prior to workouts. I became accustomed to either having an upset stomach while I was training or, to avoid a stomachache, I wouldn’t eat and would bonk in workouts. It was a constant struggle to figure out the right combination of certain foods or supplements and timing my digestion to optimize my own performance.  I never quite figured it out, until I found Super Starch. I take it about a hour prior to my workouts and it doesn’t upset my stomach, it gives me steady energy, and I get a carbohydrate source that allows me to keep burning fat stores.

title: Athletes' Feedback on Super Starch
content: I have about 20 NFL athletes that are currently using Super Starch. I would say the overwhelming response I get from them is that they feel like they can make it through our workouts without getting nauseas, they feel like they are stronger at the end of the workout, and that they love the fact that it’s so convenient for them when they are on the road travelling or running short on time.

title: Super Starch for NFL Athletes
content: Super Starch has been beneficial for 300+ pound NFL athletes as it provides them with an energy source that helps them burn body fat while they train. A defensive tackle from an NFL team lost 25 pounds just by using Super Starch and removing all other supplements that contained sugar from his diet.

title: Effectiveness of Super Starch
content: Athletes who have not benefited from Super Starch are the ones who either didn’t enjoy the taste or didn’t give it a chance because they didn’t feel a more immediate effect. The effects of Super Starch are not very noticeable unless you struggle with GI distress, which Super Starch immediately helps with.

title: Educating Athletes and Parents on Sports Nutrition Products
content: Parents need to be educated on the truth behind other products and comparing them to Super Starch in a simple way. In order to make a nutrition product something that athletes can’t live without, it needs to serve a purpose in their life or they won’t care about it. The benefits of no GI distress come into play for a lot of athletes.

title: Benefits of Super Starch for Average People
content: The benefit of Super Starch for average people and their relatively more moderate exercise regimen is not mentioned in the given text.

title: Benefits of Time-Restricted Eating
content: The benefits of time-restricted eating include convenience for people who can't time their meals with meetings, steady carbohydrate energy source, and burning fat without spiking insulin levels.
